participant_2.background:
I'd rather not talk about my parents, but I'm happy to answer any other questions.
I'm not married, I enjoy my freedom and the thrill of competition.
i cannot stand clutter or dust.
My thumbs are getting in the way of my typing, but I'm enjoying the peace and quiet of living by the lake.
I sing nursery rhymes for my son on weekends because he loves them.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How about you?
I'm doing well too. I'm just getting ready for work. What do you do for a living?
I'm a software engineer. What about you?
I'm the general manager of the local grocery store.
That sounds like a lot of responsibility. What do you like most about your job?
I love working with my team and helping our customers. What do you like most about your job?
I love the challenge of working on new and innovative projects. I also love the freedom and flexibility of my job.
That sounds great. I'm glad you enjoy your job.
Thanks! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to cook healthy meals, spend time with my pets, and relax by the lake.
That sounds like a great way to relax. I love spending time by the lake too.
It's so peaceful and quiet. What do you do on weekends?
I usually spend time with my son and sing nursery rhymes for him. I also love to compete in triathlons.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I'm not very competitive, but I do enjoy singing nursery rhymes.
It's a great way to bond with your son. I'm glad you enjoy it.
Me too. Thanks for chatting with me!
You're welcome! It was nice talking to you.
